name: Senior Java Developer (remote)
description:
We are seeking a senior Java software engineer responsible for the design, implementation and testing of Java based technologies, for a microservice and event driven architecture, which will stream IoT data via an Event Bus that includes Kafka, for event driven communication, and gRPC for point-to-point connections, based on functional and non-functional requirements, in adherence to our software development standards and best practices.

RESPONSIBILITIES:

  • Translate business requirements into technical requirements, using Jira.

  • Experience creating design diagrams using UML (or similar) such as: Architecture

    diagrams, Deployment Diagrams, Data Flow Diagrams, Sequence Diagrams,

    Activity Diagrams, Database schemas, etc.

  • Actively participate in agile meetings assisting in the grooming, scoping and sizing

    of user stories

  • Design, develop, and provide ongoing maintenance of Java application and

    associated API’s

  • Participate in defect analysis and recommend coding changes to correct issues

  • Debug and step through code and identify issues and problems

  • Craft unit and integration tests

  • Develop code according to internal published coding standards

  • Write easily understandable, testable, scalable and efficient code

  • Provide testing support to other development team members

  • Maintain and update code documentation

  • Validate designs against written specifications

  • Contribute to maintaining release of code and code management

  • Provide informative updates and consistent feedback to project team and

    supervisor regarding status

  • Mentor and support mid level and junior level developers.

REQUIRED SKILLS:

  • 5+ years developing web based applications leveraging cloud services

  • 10+ years Java programming experience, including using JDK 11 and higher

  • Recent Hands-on experience, at least 3 years, working with microservice oriented

    architectures and/or event driven architectures

  • Strong understanding of synchronous and asynchronous communication

  • Recent hands-on experience with REST and Kafka

  • Recent hands-on experience working with other messaging technologies such as JMS, ActiveMQ, RabbitMQ, etc.

  • Recent Hands-on experience, at least 3 years, implementing Unit Tests and reaching at least 70% code coverage.

  • Strong understanding of OWASP vulnerabilities and how to prevent them.

  • Strong analytical and problem solving skills, able to solve complex problems with

    efficient solutions.

  • Strong understanding about the differences between SOAP and REST services.

  • Strong understanding of Java concurrency concepts and ability to write and

    debug thread safe code

  • Strong experience with code branching and merging strategies using GitHub.

  • Strong experience participating in pair-programming sessions with other senior,

    mid level and junior developers.

  • Advanced knowledge working with modern IDEs such as IntelliJ and able to

    leverage an interactive debugger to diagnose issues

  • Advanced knowledge using Java web server technologies and servlet containers

    such as Jetty

  • Advanced knowledge of Spring Framework (DI), Spring Boot, Spring Web and

    Spring Security

  • Advanced knowledge designing RESTful APIs that include Swagger

    documentation and Open API Specifications

  • Advanced knowledge leveraging JDBC connectivity and experience with database

    abstraction layers such as jOOQ, Hibernate, or JPA

  • Advanced working knowledge of relational databases (such as MySQL, Postgres,

    or H2) and ability to write and optimize SQL queries

  • Proven experience working with various network, web and application based

    protocols

  • Experience working in an Agile development model.

  • Strong English language skills

WHAT WE OFFER:

  • Work in professional international team
  • Modern working conditions with very dynamic career opportunities
  • English lessons and other training opportunities
  • Attractive compensation package

  • 100% remote working. Work on your terms from anywhere.

  • Great team of like minded individuals who have a passion for clean code

  • Autonomy to build technical solutions without micro-management

  • Flexible hours. We communicate asynchronously via Slack

  • We keep mandatory meetings to a minimum
